overview:
Sara currently handles marketing and community development for the global rollout of a tech startup called Zaarly.

Previously, she lead the social marketing department at an ad agency where she was responsible for social/PR/digital strategy and implementation, web analytics/optimization, community building and content development for major brands. Prior to that, she handled traditional PR, advertising, branding and lead generation initiatives in both the agency and corporate sectors.

Sara was also the co-founder of Social Media Club Omaha and helps plan the Big Omaha Conference each year.
